        public Driver​(java.lang.String newName,
              int newRanking,
              java.lang.String newSpecialSkill,
              boolean newEligibleToRace,
              int newAccumulatedScore,
              int newAccumulatedTime)
        Non-Default Constructor for objects of class Driver
        Parameters:
        newName - a string to indicate a driver's name
        newRanking - an integer to indicate a driver's ranking
        newSpecialSkill - a string to indicate a driver's special skill
        newEligibleToRace - a boolean value to indicate weather a driver is eligible to race or not
        newAccumulatedScore - an integer to indicate the accumulated socre for a driver
        newAccumulatedTime - an integer to indicate the accumulated time for a driver for each race
